Title: Side Bitch
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Alison Bennett, Eva Anderson (executive story editor), Alison Bennett (executive story editor)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: Jimmy discovers Gretchen's been sneaking out of the house at night and suspects she's having an affair. Lindsay's life spirals as she discovers she doesn't know how to live on her own. Edgar takes Dorothy out on a date.
